subject: Re: Cognition campaign upload to WHWB catalogue
preview: ticket closed with time tracked in momentum tracker.

full_threads.body: ticket closed with time tracked in momentum tracker.

Hi Mel, Hi Nikki, 

Confirming the recent round of updates on https://phonakmarketing.com.au/well-hearing are now live. 

Please review and let us know if there are any further updates.

https://phonakmarketing.com.au/well-hearing
the new section is now live. please check.

5mins

@glen can you make the change below live?

Thanks!

Hi Nikki, Hi Mel, 

No sweat!

Thanks, confirming the updates have been hidden until 9 am on 27th Nov.

hi, chris. i hide the added categories for now.

5mins

Hi @glen.

Can we please revert the updates to drafts? Pls track time for these further revisions. TY. 

We we revert them to live at 9am on 27/11/23.

Hi all,

Thanks for the fast turnaround.

Yes, please make live after the 27th November.

Regards,

Melinda

Wow, thanks, guys!

I forgot to mention the most important part LOL, and that was to make it live after 27 Nov, however, it might be fine to keep it live as we kicked off our launch today. Melinda.OBrien@phonak.com can you please advise?

Regards,

Nikki

Hi Nikki, 

Great news, the requested updates have been completed and can be viewed here: https://phonakmarketing.com.au/well-hearing/

Please review and let us know if there are any further changes.

@glen can you please tackle this task? I'd like to present the updates for client review on Wednesday afternoon.

The PDF - Campaign Guide has been optimised as is now is the Media Gallery
https://phonakmarketing.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/PHAU_Guide_CognitionCampaign_optimised.pdf


+15 mins to optimise PDF - to be tracked.

Hi Guys,

Can we please have the following materials added to https://phonakmarketing.com.au/well-hearing/

Is it possible to have this completed by this Friday 24 November?

Brief:
Please create a new category titled ‘ 8. Cognition campaign’
In this category, please add the following tiles:
Evidence
Clinic enablement tools
Consumer leaflet
Campaign guide (file to come)
DL flyer
Postcard Posters
A4 signs
Pull-up banners
Emails
Blogs
Website content
Social content (additional file to follow shortly)
Key visuals

Please find the files here: Cognition campaign materials <https://sonova-my.sharepoint.com/:f:/p/nikki_ozeken/EhRsaQd65NdKgaPWgqI_NsABtVE07kTY8eI-l6nOF1o6iA?e=M8dwCv>￼ Cognition campaign materials

Please note: I will send the highlighted as separate docs very shortly.



Best regards,
Nikki Ozeken
Customer Marketing & Value Added Services Manager
Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
AU
